Name: KARM
About the game: A mysterious group of cultists is protecting a creature from beyond who wants nothing but chaos. PLAY 3 distinct episodes (each containing 10 levels) in this fast-paced action game inspired by early '90s FPS. MOVE fast like before. EXPLORE an abstract labyrinthian level-design full of secrets in lovecraftian environments. SWITCH between 7 weapons inspired by the XIXth century. WASTE your ammos without the need of reloading. CUSTOMIZE your game to suit your play style. LISTEN to the badass dynamic music. KILL them all!
Meta Title: KARM: Mar 17, 2022, Matthieu Gouby and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on KARM? Check out the release date (Mar 17, 2022), developer insights from Matthieu Gouby, and a complete game summary.
